item.title: New Virtua Fighter project ‘pre-development concept video’
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/new-virtua-fighter-project-pre-development-concept-video

In-engine footage created before development began.

Publisher SEGA and developer Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio have released a 35-second “pre-development concept video” of its new Virtua Fighter project announced at The Game Awards 2024. The video is noted as “in-engine footage” created before development began, and “not actual gameplay.” Actual gameplay and characters may differ from what is shown.

An official title, platforms, and a release date for the new Virtua Fighter project have yet to be announced.

Watch the footage below.

Pre-Development Concept Video

item.title: WWE 2K25 announced for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/wwe-2k25-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-xbox-one-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

More information to come on January 28.

Publisher 2K and developer Visual Concepts have announced WWE 2K25 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC (Steam). A release date was not announced, but more information will be announced on January 28. Wishlisting is also available via PlayStation Store and Microsoft Store.

Here is the announcement blurb:

WWE 2K returns bigger, bolder, and better than ever in a breakthrough year for the franchise!

WWE 2K25 is preparing to charge down the ramp with all the authenticity and action fans love from the best in sports entertainment.

More details on January 28, 2025.

View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Screenshots
